Reviews.Title: The microSD card is INSIDE the adapter
Reviews.Author: E. James
Reviews.Content: So, like everyone else, I had a brief spurt of panic when I opened things up, browsed through the manual, and then realized that the SD card I held in my hand was the size of the battery and things did not compute.I checked things over, though, and then I realized the microSD card was inside the adapter, and you just had to use your fingers to pull the much smaller memory card out of its adapter.  I then managed to insert the microSD card into my new camera with little bloodshed (Honest, I was missing a finger BEFORE I got the camera... ;)  and have since played around with it some and am happy with my purchase.  I'm enjoying it so far, and, of course, the fact that the camera is PURPLE is icing on the cake.  :)

Reviews.Title: good value, easy to use
Reviews.Author: rebecca beisenstein "tree crab"
Reviews.Content: this is a good little camera. in spite of it's inevitable obsolescence, it's was a good buy for the money and the picture quality and features are lots better than the old Kodak it replaced. it came with a case to protect it, which is nice. dropping the last one several times, along with dust problems were the reasons i had to replace the old one.  the battery setup and computer/charger cord are easy and convenient.

Reviews.Title: Kodak M583
Reviews.Author: Joanne Vaughn
Reviews.Content: Fast shipmentGreat product to buy at a reasonable priceI just wish the settings were easier to understand how to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera...
Reviews.Author: dougie
Reviews.Content: I bought this about a year ago and am amazed with the quality! Extra surprise I didn't know you can also take videos with sound! Amazing!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves it.  I have one just like it that she took on vacation and she was very impressed with it.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: It works wonderful and it is really great that it came with anSD card and a carrying case. And I love it.

Reviews.Title: tibeisy
Reviews.Author: tibeisy
Reviews.Content: Me gusto mucho la cámara las toma las fotos con buena nitidez y el tiempo de entrega fue rápido a pesar de la temporada alta

Reviews.Title: Small, great pictures
Reviews.Author: Kitty Boyd "Kitty B"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this camera is a steal.  What I like:1) Super tiny and lightweight.  Doesn't take up much room in purse or make it noticeably heavier.2) Battery lasts a long time between charges.  I was concerned about having a camera that had to be recharged v. just replacing batteries, but in spite of the fact that I take between 50 and 100 pictures a week, I've only had to charge my camera 3 times since I bought it 8 months ago.3) Cute color (silly, but true)4) Zoom is good and there are a lot of features regarding photo subject, lighting, etc that make my pictures turn out great.  The color in my photos w/ this camera is even better than my last camera (which was a much more expensive Canon).

Reviews.Title: Great camera bundle
Reviews.Author: Patricia Powers
Reviews.Content: This was much more than I expected.  I have an old Kodak Easyshare and love it, but needed an update.  This camera bundle was offered in an email from Amazon AND it was purple!  I love purple.  The camera is easy to operate, takes great pictures, and the video feature is a hoot.  I really didn't know it had that feature when I ordered it.  The small size is a plus and it all fits in a case the size of a billfold.  Great value overall.

Reviews.Title: The Best Ever!
Reviews.Author: bajaguy
Reviews.Content: The price first attracted me.  Then when I saw the features and accessories, I was very interested...within 10 minutes of reading information like the REVIEWS, I bought it.  Delivery was quicker then I expected and everything was perfect when it arrived and by a few hours I was taking pics.....again, a great quality camera, easy to use. But, it was the quick shipping that pleased me most! I remember that there was confusion in some of the REVIEWS about the accessories and their use... I did not experience any confusion...all went together ok.

Reviews.Title: SD card doesn't fit
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: I bought the bundle.  It came with a micro SD card.  It doesn't fit into the camera.  It is about 4x's larger than the slot.  WHY would they include it in a bundle if it doesn't fit?  Now I have to buy a different SD card.  On the other hand, the camera takes nice pictures.  This is my 3rd Kodak easy share camera and overall they are great little camera's.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Lucy "never old"
Reviews.Content: I have always liked Kodak cameras. I also own a Kodak Z981 camera.  I am sorry that Kodak stopped producing cameras.  I purchased this camera to replace a Kodak EasyShare C16/C180  that I dropped on a concrete surface causing it to malfunction.  I would recommend this camera to anyone who is a Kodak camera fan.  Have been using the camera for about 4 months and am still very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Zero Stars, Don't buy a Kodak- they are no longer making cameras because they want to "pursue more profitable ventures"!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale E. Smith "Deuces"
Reviews.Content: Zero Stars, Don't buy a Kodak- they are no longer making cameras because they want to "pursue more profitable ventures"!!!! It's right on their website!

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves this!
Reviews.Author: J. W. Coburn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my high school aged daughter who is on the yearbook committee. She wanted something easy to carry, that takes good pictures and videos. She's very happy with it and so am I. The pictures are of good quality and detail, and the videos are excellent as well. Well worth the price. I wish Kodak was still making cameras!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Packaging flaw
Reviews.Author: Taura
Reviews.Content: Great camera,great price. When received thought I did not received MicroSD card. Called company and they explained MicroSD was in the adapter card. Poor packaging.
